December 1, 1957
Education Television Research
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Sir:
I am preparing a master's project for University
of Southern California Graduate School on Closed Curcuit
T.V. for a community in Southern California.
My intentions are to give a convincing introduc¬
tion of Television as a potent tool to learning as well as
an inevitable factor in shaping our world of tomorrow. I
then want to support this introduction with a thorough pre¬
sentation of research findings in this area. The bulk of the
project will include specific detailed working plans for in¬
augurating a program with somewhat small beginnings to the
growing possibility of a cultural-educational television
station.
I would appreciate your sending any information
in Education Television Research that would be available to
assist me in my endeavor.
-n“
E. Kurt Finck
250 So. Sierra Bonita Ave.
Pasadena, Calif.
